title: Vanilla Marmalade
summary: Fragrant vanilla-infused preserve, perfect for breakfast.

items: 4 cups mixed citrus (oranges, lemons, grapefruits), peeled and chopped

instructions.value: Scrape the seeds from vanilla beans and add both seeds and pods to a large pot.
Add chopped citrus, water, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until fruit is soft.
Add sugar and stir until completely dissolved.
Increase heat to medium-high and boil for 20-25 minutes, stirring often, until thickened.
Test for doneness - a spoonful should wrinkle on a cold plate.
Remove vanilla pods (rinse, dry, and save for vanilla sugar if desired).
Pour into sterilized jars and seal.

tips_and_notes: Don't discard vanilla pods - they can be dried and used to make vanilla sugar
Mix different citrus fruits for a more complex flavor
Spread on toast or use as a filling for pastries
